translation.en: ♪ Their secret will always be mystery ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Their secret will always be  mystery ♪

translation.en: Up until today I didn't believe in them.
translation.vi: Up until today  I didn't believe in them.

translation.en: We've been this way since we went to Mako Island.
translation.vi: We've been this way  since we went to Mako Island.
